rprenames.config.title: RPRenames
rprenames.config.general.ignoreCEM.toolt: If true, CEM Renames wont be shown in list of Renames
rprenames.config.general.enableAnvilModi: If false, it wont do any modifications of anvil screen
rprenames.config.general.creativeTabCate:
If true, Renames with multiple matching items
will be shown once in RPRenames Creative Tab
Convert CEM Renames to Spawn Eggs

If true, CEM Renames will be displayed as Spawn Eggs
in RPRenames Creative Tab, otherwise, as Name Tags
rprenames.config.general.loadModBuiltinR:
If true, adds Mod's built-in Resource Packs
to pack selection screen. If false, it will not
show them. Requires restart
rprenames.config.gui.openByDefault.toolt: If true, opens RP Renames menu automatically
rprenames.config.gui.offsetMenu.tooltip: If false, Gui will not be centered on screen
rprenames.config.gui.favoriteButtonPosit:
Where to locate the "Add to Favorites" button on Screen
Top right corner by default
To the Left of Name Field
To the Right of Result Slot
rprenames.config.gui.tooltipCategory.sho: If false, Pack name in Rename's tooltip won't be shown
If false, Extra Properties in Rename's tooltip won't be shown
rprenames.config.gui.tooltipCategory.slo: If false, missing items wont be highlighted in Rename's Tooltip
If true, selected item will be highlighted in Rename's Tooltip
rprenames.config.gui.renderCategory.rend: If false, CEM Renames will be rendered as Spawn Eggs in Rename Button's Icon
rprenames.config.gui.renderCategory.high: If false, Rename Button for selected Rename won't be Highlighted
rprenames.config.gui.renderCategory.reco: If false, Tooltip background for Favorite Renames wont be changed
rprenames.config.gui.renderCategory.rend: Render Star Texture in Tooltip for Favorites

If true, Tooltip for Favorite Renames will contain
Favorite Button Texture at Top Right Corner
rprenames.config.gui.renderCategory.high: If true, Slot that contains hovered button's Item will be Highlighted
rprenames.config.gui.renderCategory.slot: Color of highlighted slot that appears on hovering button in Inventory Tab
How opaque the Color of highlighted slot is. In percents [0 - 100]
rprenames.config.gui.previewCategory.ena: If false, Preview wont be shown
rprenames.config.gui.previewCategory.pre: In which direction from Cursor to show the Preview
rprenames.config.gui.previewCategory.pla: If true, Player Preview will be shown by default instead of Item Preview
If false, Player in Player Preview wont spin and will be fixed at 45 degrees
Always allow Item being equipped on Head in Player Preview
If true, Item will always be able to render on Head in Player Preview
rprenames.config.gui.previewCategory.ent: If false, Mobs in CEM Preview wont spin and will be fixed at 45 degrees
If false, Snow Golems in name tag's tooltips will be rendered without pumpkin
rprenames.config.gui.hintsCategory.disab: If true, Page Arrows Hints wont be shown if Shift is pressed
If true, Tooltips wont tell Hints about Player Preview
If true, Tooltips wont tell Hints about quick marking Rename as Favorite
rprenames.config.debug.updateConfig.tool: Update or not Renames List on updating resource packs
rprenames.config.debug.clearConfig.toolt:
Delete data about all current active Renames manually
(It will refresh on next Resource Packs Update if "Update Renames" is true)
rprenames.config.debug.clearConfig.title: Clear
rprenames.config.debug.showNbtDisplayNam: If true, property that describes Pattern of Name from ".properties" file will be added to Buttons Tooltip
rprenames.config.debug.showOriginalPrope:
If true, simplified values of extra properties in Tooltips
will be shown as they are written in ".properties" file
rprenames.config.debug.fixDelayedPackets: Fix Tab Changing after Auto Placing items

Sometimes after placing items in anvil automatically server may response with 2 packets,
one for previous state and second one for actual slot update.
RPR counts this changes as manually moving items by player,
what leads to changing tab to Search and resetting name in nameField.
If this option true, it will try to fix it.
It is not recommended to turn it on if u haven't faced this problem.
